channel.title: Player following
channel.description:
I never looked at it a whole lot unless there was a clipping issue or something on my server long time ago.
My question what should be considered when writing this? How does this affect combat?
I am not asking for codes I am just asking for more feedback on what exactly is involved in the process itself.
